All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Admin
Represents an Admin entity with attributes such as AdminID, firstName, lastName, email, phoneNumber, userName, password, role, and joinDate.
AdminController
Controller class to handle admin-related operations and interactions.
AdminNotFoundException
Exception thrown when an admin is not found.
AdminServiceImpl
Implementation of the IAdminService interface for managing admin operations in the database.
AdminTest
The AdminTest class contains unit tests for the AdminController class.
AdminView
The AdminView class provides methods to display the admin page and handle admin operations.
AuthenticationException
Exception thrown when authentication fails.
CarConnectTestSuite
The CarConnectTestSuite class represents a test suite that includes multiple test classes.
Customer
Represents a Customer entity with attributes such as customerID, firstName, lastName, email, phoneNumber, address, userName, password, and registrationDate.
CustomerController
Controller class to handle customer-related operations and interactions.
CustomerServiceImpl
Implementation of the ICustomerService interface for managing customer operations in the database.
CustomerTest
The CustomerTest class contains unit tests for the CustomerController class.
CustomerView
The CustomerView class provides methods to display the customer page and handle customer operations.
DatabaseConnectionException
Exception thrown when a database connection cannot be established.
DBConnection
Utility class for managing database connections.
EmailService
This class provides functionality for sending confirmation emails.
IAdminService
The IAdminService interface provides methods for interacting with the Admin entity.
ICustomerService
The ICustomerService interface provides methods for interacting with the Customer entity.
InvalidInputException
Exception thrown when an invalid input is provided.
IReservationService
The IReservationService interface provides methods for interacting with the Reservation entity.
IVehicleService
The IVehicleService interface provides methods for interacting with the Vehicle entity.
MainClass
The main class that serves as the entry point for the car rental platform application.
MD5Hashing
Utility class for generating MD5 hashes from strings.
ReportGenerator
 
Reservation
Represents a reservation made by a customer for a vehicle.
ReservationController
Controller class to handle reservation-related operations and interactions.
ReservationException
Exception thrown when an error occurs related to reservation operations.
ReservationServiceImpl
Implementation of the IReservationService interface for managing reservation operations in the database.
ReservationTest
The ReservationTest class contains unit tests for the ReservationController class.
Vehicle
Represents a vehicle available for rental.
VehicleController
Controller class to handle vehicle-related operations and interactions.
VehicleNotFoundException
Exception thrown when a vehicle is not found.
VehicleServiceImpl
Implementation of the IVehicleService interface for managing vehicle operations in the database.
VehicleTest
The VehicleTest class contains unit tests for the VehicleController class.
